author: dlr
msg: On the whole-branch-merge branch: Start working towards requiring that
the mergeinfo for the merge source only require the latest *committed
revision* for the WC's merge target, rather than the absolute latest
revision in the repository.
* subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c
(ensure_wc_reflects_repository_subtree): Drop REV parameter, and
tweak doc string and implementation accordingly.
(svn_client_merge_whole_branch): Rename a couple of local variables,
and adjust for API change.  Set "rev" to entry->cmt_rev, after
successfully running the gauntlet of ensure_wc_reflects_repository_subtree().
Put in skeleton code to address the case where we have no mergeinfo for
our merge target on our merge source.

author: dlr
msg: On the whole-branch-merge branch: Comment improvements.
* subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c
(ensure_wc_reflects_repository_subtree): Consistify doc string
formatting, and add comment about how we retrieve the BASE revision
in *REV.  Add inline comment indicating the same.

author: dlr
msg: On the whole-branch-merge branch: I18N work.
* subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c
(ensure_wc_reflects_repository_subtree): I18N remaining error
messages.

author: dlr
msg: On the whole-branch-merge branch: Implement depth-aware "WC reflects
repository" check used to verify preparedness for whole-branch merges.
* subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c
(ensure_wc_reflects_repository_subtree): Leverage the new
svn_wc_revision_status_t->sparse_checkout flag.  I18N error message.

author: dlr
msg: On the whole-branch-merge branch: Adjust for conventions.
* subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c
(ensure_wc_reflects_repository_subtree): Use SVN_IS_VALID_REVNUM()
macro instead of direct comparison to SVN_INVALID_REVNUM.
